categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures Game Books

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures Game Book 14: Podrace to Freedom
Episode I Adventures Game Book 14: Podrace to Freedom was the fourteenth installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures game books.
You are a slavery on the planet Tatooine. When a band of visitors needs a way to leave Tatooine, you offer to help.
Your only hope is to win the most dangerous Podrace of your life.
